uhh_lt.GermEval2017.baseline.featureExtractor

Interface FeatureExtractor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GazeteerFeature, TfIdfFeature

    public interface FeatureExtractor
    Interface for feature extractors. Specifies common methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Feature[] extractFeature(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas cas)
      Extracts the feature using a JCas
      int getFeatureCount()
      Returns the maximal number of features that the extractor can produce.
      int getOffset()
      Returns the feature offset of the FeatureExtractor.

    • Method Detail

      • extractFeature

        de.bwaldvogel.liblinear.Feature[] extractFeature(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas cas)
        Extracts the feature using a JCas
        Parameters:
        cas - the provided JCas
        Returns:
        an array of Features, a training instance

      • getFeatureCount

        int getFeatureCount()
        Returns the maximal number of features that the extractor can produce.
        Returns:
        the number of features in the FeatureExtractor

      • getOffset

        int getOffset()
        Returns the feature offset of the FeatureExtractor. All feature ids start from this offset to prevent overlaps.
        Returns:
        the feature offset of the FeatureExtractor
